channel.title: [RESOLVED] Don't own the game anymore?
channel.description:
What happened: I logged into steam today and steam told me that Throne of Lies is no longer activated on my account due to a payment problem.. Yet I've owned and played the game for a few months now. There's proof of that on a couple Youtube video's (IGN AIVION). Unsure why it would be telling me this when I've bought the game and played it already. I can no longer play it anymore.
What was SUPPOSED to happen: None of the above was suppost to happen I paid my 10 dollars for the game. What gives?
Cheers.
(P.S I also still have the email with the CD Key + Receipt as well for further proof I've successfully bought the game)

item.title: [RESOLVED] Don't own the game anymore?
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
We found the pattern and all accidental deactivations were emailed a replacement key + a bonus key from Elsa. If you still cannot find the email, continue with the above task ^

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED] Don't own the game anymore?
item.dc:creator: robflop
item.description:
Please contact Xblade on Discord at Xblade#4892 with details of your purchase (receipt, username, email connected to the purchase).

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED] Don't own the game anymore?

item.description:
What happened: I logged into steam today and steam told me that Throne of Lies is no longer activated on my account due to a payment problem… Yet I’ve owned and played the game for a few months now. There’s proof of that on a couple Youtube video’s (IGN AIVION). Unsure why it would be telling me this when I’ve bought the game and played it already. I can no longer play it anymore.

Cheers.
